articles.title: What The Rise Of Amazon Has To Do With The Rise Of Trump - NPR
articles.description: The new book Fulfillment, by Alec MacGillis, looks at America's economic history — as well as its future — through the lens of Amazon.
articles.content: Members of the Workers Assembly Against Racism gather across from an Amazon-owned Whole Foods Market in New York City as part of a nationwide solidarity event with Amazon workers seeking to unionize … [+12289 chars]

articles.title: Latin America surpasses 1 million COVID-19 deaths - CBS News
articles.description: The region accounts for approximately 29% of global fatalities.
articles.content: More than 1 million total COVID-19 deaths have been reported in Latin America and the Caribbean as of Saturday, according to data collected by Johns Hopkins University. The region — which accounts fo… [+2196 chars]
